ygData.subject: Re: Cast force
ygData.msgSnippet: Cast Force is a DD spell NOT an AE Quindinar ... From:  To:  Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 9:01 AM Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
Cast Force is a DD spell NOT an AE

Quindinar
----- Original Message -----
From: <cnj005@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 9:01 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Cast force


> From: cnj005@...
>
>
> Hail;
> Although I've done quite well by Innoruuk to eavesdrop on your
conversations, I think I may have found a kinship of sorts with you all. I
am a Tier'dal Wizard in the Xegony Dimension and yes I have found this
spell. A brief description follows.
> Cast Force
> LVL 24 spell
> AE spell centered around the caster
> With my superior Intelligence for a Tier'dal, It deals a maximum of 90pts
of dmg to all mobs around the caster.
> Mana cost is somewhere around 130 although I fear I payed little attention
to this as I use this spell very infrequently.
> Location, I know for a fact that the Beautiful Tier'dal woman in the Tower
of Magic deep within Neriak sells this spell. It can be found in the
chamber of wizards, on the vendor who deals in higher lvl spells.
> In closing I wish to invite all the inspiring Tier'dal wizards to use this
information to their best; Where you other races may choke on it for it is
deffinately beyond your grasp.
> Hail Innoruuk!
> Demistraties Stro'Various
> Darkmoon Army
